peril.views.slick.io

Class AssetReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.io.FileParser
      • peril.views.slick.io.AssetReader

  • public final class AssetReader
extends FileParser
    Reads all the visual elements in a specified assets details file and adds them in their specified Containers. Use parseLine() process one line of the file.
    Since:
    2018-02-17
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Container, Image, Button, FunctionHelper

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String BUTTON
      The string that denotes whether a line should be parsed as a Button.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Container> containers
      The Map of Container's names to Containers that the parsed assets will be placed in.
      private static java.lang.String DONT_SCALE
      The string that denotes whether a asset should not be scaled.
      private FunctionHelper functionHandler
      Holds the FunctionHelper that contains the functions that Buttons will execute.
      private GameController game
      The GameController that allows access to the game.
      private static java.lang.String IMAGE
      The string that denotes whether a line should be parsed as a Viewable.
      private static java.lang.String SCALE_TO_WINDOW
      The string that denotes whether a asset should be scaled to the size of the containing window.
